languages.text: "Душа псайкера — отверстые врата для Губительных сил". {n}Эдельтрад прожигает вас взглядом, цедя каждое слово сквозь зубы.{/n} "Едва ли подданн{mf|ый|ая} {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} надеж{mf|ен|на}, если сам{mf||а} приглашает скверну войти в чертог".

traits.locale_text: "Душа псайкера — отверстые врата для Губительных сил". {n}Эдельтрад прожигает вас взглядом, цедя каждое слово сквозь зубы.{/n} "Едва ли подданн{mf|ый|ая} {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} надеж{mf|ен|на}, если сам{mf||а} приглашает скверну войти в чертог".

languages.text: "A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."
languages.original_text: "Душа псайкера — отверстые врата для Губительных сил". {n}Эдельтрад прожигает вас взглядом, цедя каждое слово сквозь зубы.{/n} "Едва ли подданн{mf|ый|ая} {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} надеж{mf|ен|на}, если сам{mf||а} приглашает скверну войти в чертог".

traits.locale_text: "A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he mutters every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly rely on a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

"A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he mutters every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly rely on a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

"A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

"A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

"A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

languages.text: “灵能者的灵魂会成为毁灭之力的大门。”{n}艾德萨德的目光灼烧着你，每个字都是从牙缝中挤出来的。{/n}“身为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的仆人，却如此渴望投入腐化的怀抱。这样的人恐怕不值得信任。”
languages.original_text: "A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

traits.locale_text: “灵能者的灵魂会成为毁灭之力的大门。”{n}艾德萨德的目光灼烧着你，每个字都是从牙缝中挤出来的。{/n}“身为{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的仆人，却如此渴望投入腐化的怀抱。这样的人恐怕不值得信任。”

languages.text: «El alma de un psíquico es una puerta abierta para los Poderes Ruinosos». {n}La mirada de Edelthrad te atraviesa al hablar, obligando a cada palabra a salir de su boca.{/n} «No sería sensato confiar en un{mf||a} sirvient{mf|e|a} del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} que tiene tantas ganas de llamar a la corrupción».
languages.original_text: "A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

traits.locale_text: «El alma de un psíquico es una puerta abierta para los Poderes Ruinosos». {n}La mirada de Edelthrad te atraviesa al hablar, obligando a cada palabra a salir de su boca.{/n} «No sería sensato confiar en un{mf||a} sirvient{mf|e|a} del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} que tiene tantas ganas de llamar a la corrupción».

languages.text: 「異能者の魂は<禍つ神々>への大きく開いた門だ」{n}エデルスラドがあらゆる言葉を使って白々しい嘘を語る間、彼の視線はあなたを焼き尽くす。{/n}「これほど腐敗を導くことに熱心な{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の下僕を信頼できる人なんていない」
languages.original_text: "A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

traits.locale_text: 「異能者の魂は<禍つ神々>への大きく開いた門だ」{n}エデルスラドがあらゆる言葉を使って白々しい嘘を語る間、彼の視線はあなたを焼き尽くす。{/n}「これほど腐敗を導くことに熱心な{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の下僕を信頼できる人なんていない」
「異能者の魂は<禍つ神々>への大きく開いた門だ」{n}エデルスラドがあらゆる言葉を使って白々しい嘘を語る間、彼の視線はあなたを焼き尽くす。{/n}「これほど腐敗を導くことに熱心な{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の下僕を信頼できる人なんていない」

languages.text: {n}Edelthrad vous foudroie du regard et déclare, la mâchoire serrée :{/n} « L'âme d'un psyker est une passerelle béante pour les Puissances de la Ruine. Difficile de faire confiance à {mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} aussi {mf|désireux|désireuse} de provoquer la corruption. »
languages.original_text: "A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Edelthrad vous foudroie du regard et déclare, la mâchoire serrée :{/n} « L'âme d'un psyker est une passerelle béante pour les Puissances de la Ruine. Difficile de faire confiance à {mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} aussi {mf|désireux|désireuse} de provoquer la corruption. »

languages.text: "Die Seele eines Psionikers ist ein weit offenes Portal für die Mächte der Zerstörung." {n}Edelthrads Blick brennt durch dich hindurch, während er jedes einzelne Wort durch seine Zähne presst.{/n} "Niemand sollte {mf|einem Diener|einer Dienerin} des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} vertrauen, {mf|der|sie} sich so leichtfertig der Verderbnis aussetzt."
languages.original_text: "A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Die Seele eines Psionikers ist ein weit offenes Portal für die Mächte der Zerstörung." {n}Edelthrads Blick brennt durch dich hindurch, während er jedes einzelne Wort durch seine Zähne presst.{/n} "Niemand sollte {mf|einem Diener|einer Dienerin} des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} vertrauen, {mf|der|sie} sich so leichtfertig der Verderbnis aussetzt."

languages.text: "Bir ruhsezerin ruhu, Yıkıcı Güçler için ağzına dek açık bir kapı gibidir." {n}Edelthrad'ın sıktığı dişleri arasından sözcükler dökülürken bakışları âdeta seni delip geçiyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} yozlaşmaya önayak olmaya bu denli hevesli bir hizmetkârına güvenmek pek mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: "A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} who is so eager to usher in corruption."

traits.locale_text: "Bir ruhsezerin ruhu, Yıkıcı Güçler için ağzına dek açık bir kapı gibidir." {n}Edelthrad'ın sıktığı dişleri arasından sözcükler dökülürken bakışları âdeta seni delip geçiyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un yozlaşmaya önayak olmaya bu denli hevesli bir hizmetkârına güvenmek pek mümkün değil."

languages.original_text: "A psyker's soul is a yawning gate for the Ruinous Powers." {n}Edelthrad's gaze burns through you as he grits out every word through his teeth.{/n} "One could hardly trust a servant of the Imperium who is so eager to usher in corruption."
